items.name: 5etools Note
entries: Ontharr Frume is presented in {@adventure Hoard of the Dragon Queen|HotDQ} and The {@adventure Rise of Tiamat|RoT} as a lawful good, human paladin of Torm. The {@creature war priest|vgm} stat block from {@book Volo's Guide to Monsters|VGM} has been provided here for ease of use.
